item.title: 资金流向穷国，世界银行呼吁减免债务
item.description: 世界银行的顶级经济学家呼吁私人贷款人承担免除最贫穷国家债务的部分费用，因为创纪录的高还款额耗尽了本应集中用于卫生、教育和基础设施建设的预算。【原文：The World Bank’s top economist called on private lenders to shoulder some of the cost of debt forgiveness for the poorest countries, as record high repayments drain budgets that should be focused on health, education and infrastructure.】

item.title: 欧盟为电动汽车电池提供援助以避免中国竞争
item.description: 依赖中国零部件的电动汽车电池制造商面临着被欧盟削减 10 亿欧元补贴的风险，因为欧盟的目标是促进其自身的生产和供应链。【原文：EV battery manufacturers relying on Chinese components risk being cut out of €1 billion in European Union subsidies as the bloc aims to boost its own production and supply chains.】

item.title: 英特尔将向下台的首席执行官盖尔辛格支付高达 1,000 万美元的薪酬
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）下台的首席执行官帕特-格尔辛格（Pat Gelsinger）因董事会对其扭转这家标志性芯片制造商的计划失去信心而被迫下台，他将获得高达 1000 万美元的遣散费。【原文：Intel Corp.’s ousted Chief Executive Officer Pat Gelsinger, who was forced out after the board lost confidence in his plans to turn around the iconic chipmaker, is set to receive as much as $10 million in severance pay.】

item.title: 日本 SBI 将成为金融科技公司 Solaris 的主要股东
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，日本 SBI 控股公司将成为 Solaris SE 的多数股权所有者，因为在这家德国金融科技公司目前的一轮融资中，SBI 的出资额最大。【原文：Japan’s SBI Holdings Inc. is set to become the majority owner of Solaris SE after offering the largest contribution in a current fundraising round by the German fintech, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Pemex 宣誓不再发生死亡事故。至少六名工人死亡
item.description: 墨西哥国营石油公司因其设施发生的一系列致命事故而面临更严格的审查，该公司在今年年初制定了一个雄心勃勃的目标：不再发生死亡事故。【原文：Mexico’s state-run oil company, facing heightened scrutiny over a string of deadly accidents at its facilities, set an ambitious goal early this year: No more fatalities.】

item.title: Omers 私募股权投资部门从 Frontenac 收购 IT 公司 Integris
item.description: Omers Private Equity 正从总部位于芝加哥的 Frontenac Company LLC 收购美国网络安全和 IT 咨询公司 Integris 的多数股权，收购金额未披露。【原文：Omers Private Equity is buying a majority stake in Integris, a US cybersecurity and IT consulting company, from Chicago-based Frontenac Company LLC for an undisclosed amount.】

item.title: 北海石油市场出现 16 年来最大交易狂潮
item.description: 北海原油市场刚刚经历了至少 16 年来最大的交易狂潮，这增加了未来一年油价的不确定性。【原文：The North Sea crude market just witnessed its largest trading frenzy in at least 16 years, adding to uncertainty over oil prices in the year ahead.】

item.title: 劳埃德银行计划将 SRT 与 10 亿英镑的英国重组抵押贷款挂钩
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group Plc）正在出售与约 10 亿英镑（约合 13 亿美元）英国抵押贷款相关的重大风险转移，这些抵押贷款已经进行了期限延长等修改。【原文：Lloyds Banking Group Plc is selling a significant risk transfer linked to around £1 billion ($1.3 billion) of UK mortgages, which have been subject to modifications such as term extensions, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 生物技术亿万富翁宋世雄因 ImmunityBio 股票走势遭起诉
item.description: 生物技术亿万富翁帕特里克-宋（Patrick Soon-Shiong）在一起股东诉讼案中被指控在该公司旗舰抗癌药物的前景方面误导 ImmunityBio Inc.【原文：Biotech billionaire Patrick Soon-Shiong was accused in a shareholder lawsuit of misleading ImmunityBio Inc. investors about the prospects of the company’s flagship cancer drug in order to enrich himself at their expense.】

item.title: 人工智能挤走加密货币，比特币矿工 MARA 收购德州风电场
item.description: 全球最大的比特币矿商之一正在购买一个风力发电场，为其运营提供电力，因为大型科技公司越来越多地为自己的数据中心吸走可用的电力资源。【原文：One of the world’s biggest Bitcoin miners is buying a wind farm to power its operations as big tech firms increasingly suck up available sources of electricity for their own data centers.】

item.title: 在巴西，有组织犯罪利用金融科技行业洗钱
item.description:
第一资本司令部是一个令人生畏的贩毒集团，被指控在数字平台上实施数百万美元的诈骗

。【原文：

El Primer Comando de la Capital, un temido grupo de tráfico de drogas, está acusado de realizar estafas multimillonarias en plataformas digitales

】

item.title: TikTok 删除与罗马尼亚候选人有关的秘密网络
item.description: TikTok 的高管表示，该社交媒体平台删除了一个暗中为卡林-乔治斯库（Calin Georgescu）助选的网络，后者在 11 月 24 日的总统选举中的惊人胜利使该国陷入了自共产主义垮台以来最大的政治危机。【原文：TikTok executives said the social media platform removed a network covertly campaigning for Calin Georgescu, whose shock victory in the Nov. 24 presidential election threw the country into the biggest political crisis since the fall of communism.】

item.title: 阿达尼贿赂案有可能抑制对印度太阳能热潮的热情
item.description:
该国需要数万亿美元的投资，包括大量外国资本，才能摆脱煤炭依赖。这一挑战变得更加严峻。【原文：

The country needs trillions of investment, including a hefty dose of foreign capital, to wean itself from coal. That challenge just got tougher.

】

item.title: 巴西经济再次扩张，消费者继续大手笔消费
item.description: 巴西第三季度的经济增长超过预期，消费者和政府的巨额支出刺激了通胀，令市场哗然。【原文：Brazil’s economy grew more than expected in the third quarter, bolstered by hefty consumer and government spending that’s fanning inflation and rattling markets.】

item.title: 英特尔耐心耗尽 CEO 盖尔辛格的长期战略
item.description: 英特尔面临的挑战并没有因为其高层主管的离职而消失。但首先...【原文：Intel’s challenges didn’t disappear with the departure of its top executive. But first...】

item.title: 俄罗斯海运原油出口在 "欧佩克+"重要会谈前大幅增长
item.description:
西方港口流量激增，两年后制裁影响减弱

Flows from western ports surge, with impact of sanctions muted after two years

】

item.description:

Police say the PCC, a global drug-trafficker, is accused of running billion-dollar digital platform scams

item.title: 绘制大脑地图的新方法：用病毒感染大脑
item.description:
一个名为 E11 的实验室正在研究一种新技术，以绘制小鼠大脑的详细地图。【原文：

A lab named E11 is working on a novel technique to produce a detailed map of a mouse brain.

】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易政策为何令印度经济学家欢欣鼓舞？
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的一名经济学编辑，今天我们将关注即将上任的特朗普政府领导下的印度与美国的关系。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at India’s ties with the US under the incoming Trump administration. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 美国码头工人认为僵局正处于劳工史上的 "关键 "时刻
item.description: 美国码头工人工会于 10 月份在东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸的各大港口举行了罢工，但在与雇主的合同谈判中，双方仍就技术问题僵持不下。【原文：The US dockworkers’ union that walked out of every major East and Gulf coast port in October remains at loggerheads over technology in contract negotiations with their employers — with just six weeks left to reach a deal and prevent another strike.】

item.description:
长岛 社区居民可能失去家园和 1.3 亿美元

。【原文：

Long Island community residents may lose homes and $130 million

】

item.title: 软件初创公司 ServiceTitan 寻求 IPO 筹资 5.02 亿美元
item.description: 家庭服务软件企业 ServiceTitan Inc. 正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集高达 5.016 亿美元的资金，这可能是 2024 年美国最后一次大型上市。【原文：Home service software business ServiceTitan Inc. is seeking to raise as much as $501.6 million in an initial public offering, in what could be the last major US listing of 2024.】

item.title: 贝莱德将以 120 亿美元全股票交易收购信贷公司 HPS
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）同意以全股票交易的方式收购 HPS Investment Partners，交易价值约为 120 亿美元，此次收购将推动这家全球最大的资产管理公司跻身私人信贷的最高行列。【原文：BlackRock Inc. agreed to buy HPS Investment Partners in an all-stock deal valued at roughly $12 billion, a purchase that will propel the world’s largest asset manager into the highest ranks of private credit.】

item.title: AT&T 预计到 2027 年实现利润增长，计划回购 200 亿美元资产
item.description: AT&T 公司预测未来三年利润将持续增长，包括 2027 年的两位数增长，这是其投资移动电话和光纤网络的回报。【原文：AT&T Inc. predicted sustained profit growth over the next three years, including double-digit gains in 2027, a payoff from its investments in mobile-phone and fiber-optic networks.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"正就推迟三个月增产达成协议
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+正朝着达成一项将石油生产复兴再推迟三个月的协议迈进。【原文：OPEC+ is making progress toward an agreement to delay its oil-production revival by another three months, delegates said.】

item.title: 瑞银因骚扰举报人在法国面临刑事审判
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在巴黎受审，被控骚扰一对揭发该银行帮助法国富人逃税的举报人。【原文：UBS Group AG stands trial in Paris accused of harassing a pair of whistleblowers who lifted the lid on the bank’s efforts to help wealthy French dodge taxes.】

item.title: 在英伟达和其他七巨头中寻找价值
item.description: 如今，可能没有多少自称为价值投资者的人对购买七大科技股的前景垂涎欲滴了。阿斯沃思-达莫达兰（Aswath Damodaran）就是其中之一。【原文：There probably aren’t too many self-proclaimed value investors salivating over the prospect of buying the Magnificent Seven tech stocks these days. Aswath Damodaran counts himself as one.】

item.title: 印尼称苹果将把投资额提高到 10 亿美元
item.description: 印度尼西亚表示，它已收到苹果公司价值 10 亿美元的改进投资报价，这是这家科技巨头为解除 iPhone 16 设备在东南亚最大经济体的销售禁令所做的最新努力。【原文：Indonesia said that it has received an improved investment offer worth $1 billion from Apple Inc., in the tech giant’s latest bid to lift a ban on the sale of iPhone 16 devices in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 人工智能推动销售额跃升至创纪录水平后，Salesforce 面临现实考验
item.description: Salesforce 公司大举进军人工智能领域，推动股价创下历史新高。现在，华尔街希望证明这笔巨额支出会带来回报。【原文：Salesforce Inc.’s big push into artificial intelligence has helped drive shares to a record high. Now, Wall Street wants proof that the heavy spending is going to pay off.】
